Weathering with you

It’s sunny today. Ready to go see “Weathering with you.” Seems that you get the better of the whole experience when it’s raining when the movie starts, and sunny at the end. Well, lets’ see.

Amazing to think that “Your name.” is already 3 years ago. That was a blast. I can only hope that Makoto Shinkai can keep up this 3 years pace.

Go see the real thing
